comp102x

Class ColorImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp102x.CanvasObject
      • comp102x.ColorImage

  • public class ColorImage
extends CanvasObject
    The ColorImage class represents an image read from the file system. It also provides various method for manipulating the image.
    Author:
    leofan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorImage()
      Constructs a ColorImage object by loading an image from the file system and re-scales it to fit the default canvas size.
      ColorImage(boolean rescale)
      Constructs a ColorImage object by loading an image from the file system and re-scales it to fit the default canvas size if indicated.
      ColorImage(ColorImage copy)
      Constructs a copy of the given ColorImage object.
      ColorImage(int width, int height)
      Constructs a blank white ColorImage object with a specify width and height.
      ColorImage(java.lang.String filename)
      Constructs a ColorImage object by using a filename and re-scales it to fit the default canvas size.
      ColorImage(java.lang.String filename, boolean rescale)
      Constructs a ColorImage object by using a filename and re-scales it to fit the default canvas size if indicated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorImage

        public ColorImage()
        Constructs a ColorImage object by loading an image from the file system and re-scales it to fit the default canvas size.

      • ColorImage

        public ColorImage(boolean rescale)
        Constructs a ColorImage object by loading an image from the file system and re-scales it to fit the default canvas size if indicated.
        Parameters:
        rescale - Flag indicating whether to re-scale the image or not.

      • ColorImage

        public ColorImage(java.lang.String filename)
        Constructs a ColorImage object by using a filename and re-scales it to fit the default canvas size.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the image.

      • ColorImage

        public ColorImage(java.lang.String filename,
          boolean rescale)
        Constructs a ColorImage object by using a filename and re-scales it to fit the default canvas size if indicated.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the image.
        rescale - Flag indicating whether to re-scale the image or not.

      • ColorImage

        public ColorImage(int width,
          int height)
        Constructs a blank white ColorImage object with a specify width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the ColorImage object to be constructed.
        height - The height of the ColorImage object to be constructed.

      • ColorImage

        public ColorImage(ColorImage copy)
        Constructs a copy of the given ColorImage object.
        Parameters:
        copy - The ColorImage object to be copied from.

      • add

        public void add(int value)
        Adds a value to all the RGB channels of this ColorImage object.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to add.

      • subtract

        public ColorImage subtract(ColorImage operand)
        Subtracts another ColorImage object to this ColorImage object.
        Parameters:
        operand - The color image to subtract.
        Returns:
        A new ColorImage object representing the subtraction result.

      • subtract

        public void subtract(int value)
        Subtracts a value from all the RGB channels of this ColorImage object.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to subtract.

      • multiply

        public ColorImage multiply(ColorImage operand)
        Multiplies another ColorImage object to this ColorImage object. The other ColorImage object is used as an intensity mask i.e. newPixel.value = pixelOfThisImage.value * pixelOfAnotherImage.value / 255.0.
        Parameters:
        operand - The color image to multiply.
        Returns:
        A new ColorImage object representing the multiplication result.

      • multiply

        public void multiply(int value)
        Multiplies a value to all the RGB channels of this ColorImage object. The value is first normalized by value = value / 255.0.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to multiply.

      • divide

        public ColorImage divide(ColorImage operand)
        Divides another ColorImage object to this ColorImage object. The division result is then multiplied by 255.0 to give the final value i.e. newPixel.value = pixelOfThisImage.value / pixelOfAnotherImage .value * 255.0.
        Parameters:
        operand - The ColorImage to divide.
        Returns:
        A new ColorImage object representing the division result.

      • divide

        public void divide(int value)
        Divides all the RGB channels of this ColorImage object by a value. The division result is then multiplied by 255.0 to give the final value i.e. newPixel.value = pixelOfThisImage.value / givenValue * 255.0.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to divide.

      • convolve

        public void convolve(float[][] kernel)
        Convolves the ColorImage object with a specified kernel.
        Parameters:
        kernel - The kernel of the convolution as a 2D float matrix.

      • threshold

        public void threshold(int thresholdValue)
        Thresholds the ColorImage object by a specific value. Set the channel to 255 if the original value is greater than the threshold value, otherwise 0.
        Parameters:
        thresholdValue - The threshold value.

      • invert

        public void invert()
        Inverts the ColorImage object by color.

      • averageDifference

        public double averageDifference(ColorImage operand)
        Gets the average difference between this ColorImage object and the other ColorImage object.
        Parameters:
        operand - The other color image object.
        Returns:
        The average difference between the color image objects, 0.0 = no difference.

      • match

        public int match(ColorImage target,
        boolean drawSquare)
        Counts the number appearance of a sub image inside this image.
        Parameters:
        target - The sub image.
        drawSquare - A flag to specify if squares will be drawn in the current image to identify the found sub images.
        Returns:
        The number of appearance of the sub image.

      • drawRectangle

        public void drawRectangle(int x,
                 int y,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Draws a rectangle on this ColorImage object.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the rectangle.
        y - The y position of the rectangle.
        width - The width of the rectangle.
        height - The height of the rectangle.

      • drawRectangle

        public void drawRectangle(int x,
                 int y,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 int red,
                 int green,
                 int blue)
        Draws a rectangle on this ColorImage object with a specific color.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the rectangle.
        y - The y position of the rectangle.
        width - The width of the rectangle.
        height - The height of the rectangle.
        red - The value of the red channel of the color.
        green - The value of the green channel of the color.
        blue - The value of the blue channel of the color.

      • drawImage

        public void drawImage(ColorImage overImage,
             int x,
             int y)
        Overlays another ColorImage object on top of the current one.
        Parameters:
        overImage - The overlaying color image object.
        x - The x position of the overlaying image.
        y - The y position of the overlaying image.

      • getGraphics2D

        public java.awt.Graphics2D getGraphics2D()
        Gets the graphics object of this ColorImage, which can be used for some graphics operations, e.g. drawing shapes.
        Returns:
        The graphics object

      • createRedImage

        public ColorImage createRedImage()
        Creates a copy of this ColorImage object with the green and blue channel removed.
        Returns:
        A copy of this image with only red channel retained.

      • createCyanImage

        public ColorImage createCyanImage()
        Creates a copy of this ColorImage object with the red channel removed.
        Returns:
        A copy of this image with green and blue channel retained.

      • fillWithRandomNoise

        public void fillWithRandomNoise(int percentage,
                       int dotSize)
        Fills this ColorImage object with random pepper and salt noise.
        Parameters:
        percentage - The percentage of white (salt) noise.
        dotSize - the size of the noise dots.

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves the color image to a .png image file.

             ColorImage image2)
        Adds two ColorImage objects together.
        Parameters:
        image1 - The first ColorImage object to add.
        image2 - The second ColorImage object to add.
        Returns:
        A new ColorImage object representing the addition result.

        Parameters:

        image2 - The ColorImage object to subtract.
        Returns:
        A new ColorImage object representing the subtraction result.
